name: GoogleCloudDNS
description: Create and manage DNS records in Google Cloud
helpMarkDown: [Learn more about this task](https://github.com/nexsolab/azure-devops-google-cloud-tools#readme) or [see the Cloud DNS documentation](https://cloud.google.com/sdk/gcloud/reference/dns/record-sets)
author: Gabriel Anderson

inputs.name: authenticationMethod
inputs.label: Authentication method
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Authorization requires the following Google IAM roles:
`roles/dns.admin`

inputs.name: SCserviceAccount
inputs.label: Google Cloud Service Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Service Account that should be used for the next steps

inputs.name: jsonCredentials
inputs.label: JSON Credentials file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the JSON file with the credentials, see for more information

inputs.name: recordZone
inputs.label: Managed Zone
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the managed-zone whose record-sets you want to manage.

inputs.name: recordName
inputs.label: DNS
inputs.helpMarkDown: DNS or domain name of the record-set to add.

inputs.name: outputTemplate
inputs.label: Output template
inputs.helpMarkDown: The template of the value for the record set to be exported as an environment variable. [Cloud DNS Docs](https://cloud.google.com/dns/docs/reference/v1/resourceRecordSets/list)

inputs.name: recordValue
inputs.label: Value of the record
inputs.helpMarkDown: The record value. i.e. If type A: '1.2.3.4', type CNAME: 'other.site.com'...

inputs.name: recordTtl
inputs.label: TTL (time to live) - in seconds
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of seconds that this record can be cached by resolvers.

OutputVariables.name: DnsRecordValue
OutputVariables.description: The current data value of the record.
